sections.title: Instructions
sections.markdown:
- Set aside about 5 minutes in a quiet spot.
- Use short phrases; complete sentences are optional.
- If a prompt does not fit, skip it and move on.
- Read through once, then summarize in your own words.

sections.title: Client worksheet
sections.markdown:
### What this is
Anxiety grows when we avoid or escape feared situations. Avoidance brings short-term relief but teaches the brain the situation is dangerous.

### Why it matters
- Understanding the cycle helps reduce avoidance.
- Small exposures build confidence over time.

### Try this
- Name one avoided situation.
- Choose one tiny step toward it this week.

### Common traps
- Waiting for anxiety to be zero before acting.
- Taking on a step that is too large.
